title: Scrum-Half

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, a Rugby player Ball-carrier may choose to target you to pass the ball to you instead of doing the factional kill.
- At night, choose two players. The first player is controlled to visit the second player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.

desc:
Post 2864
*"I'm open! I'm open!"*
*- never gets the ball*
